title: Geoffrey Cox – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Withdrawing from Conservative Leadership
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Geoffrey Cox, the Conservative MP for Torridge and West Devon, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
A thoughtful, wise and statesmanlike decision by Boris Johnson to withdraw, reflecting the qualities that made so many of us originally put our faith in him 3 years ago. Putting the country and the party first.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
